title: No question of PM’s resignation: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 30 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Wednesday said that Prime Minister Imran Khan was a player who would fight till the last ball.
In a tweet, he said there was no question of resignation by the Prime Minister and friends and foes would eventually witness the fight.
وزیر اعظم عمران خان آخری بال تک لڑنے والے کھلاڑی ہیں استعفیٰ نہیں ملے گا میدان لگے گا، دوست بھی دیکھیں گے اور دشمن بھی ۔۔۔
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) March 30, 2022
